name: PANDAMONIUM: HOLIDAY HARERAISER
description:
SPACE - Throw/Attack

Up - Jump     -----------------         UP X 2 - Jump (Zooey Only)

PandaMonium: Holiday Hareraiser  is a retro style 8-bit video game from Mycho Digital, the new Digital media division of UK Horror Movie studio Mycho Entertainment. 

Play as Panda Headed Serial Killer Jacob Jakushi or Zooey the Rabbit Masked Ripper as they knife their way through the offices of Killmore & Percival, dispatching Yuppies and taking Strippers as payment in this brand new adventure which promises to be a Holiday HareRaiser. 

Based on the Indie Horror hit Pandamonium, Pandamonium: Holiday Hareraiser is a Christmas themed  game leaning into the  wacky nature of 80's and 90's movie game adaptions and pushing the films narratives to new. absurd places.
